channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jill Biden's ex-husband charged with murdering his wife
item.description: A grand jury indicted William Stevenson, 77, with first-degree murder in connection with the death of his wife.

item.title: Savannah Guthrie says her mom is a woman of faith and a source of strength for the family
'We don't know where she is': Search continues for Savannah Guthrie's mom
item.description: Investigations are continuing after the mother of “Today” show host Savannah Guthrie disappeared over the weekend in what authorities believe was a po...

item.title: Defense seeks to block videos of Charlie Kirk’s killing in murder case, claims bias
More companies are pointing to AI as they lay off employees
item.description: Although economists have generally downplayed the impact of artificial intelligence on jobs, some employers are highlighting their adoption of AI.

item.title: Ransom note being investigated in Nancy Guthrie's disappearance, sheriff says

item.title: Trump takes questions on his call to "nationalize elections"

item.title: House passes funding package to end partial government shutdown
item.description: The House held votes on Tuesday to reopen the government after it partially shut down over the weekend.

item.title: WATCH: Possible biological lab found inside Las Vegas home, FBI says

item.title: Signs of forced entry found at Arizona home of ‘Today’ show host Savannah Guthrie’s mother
item.description: Investigators have found signs of forced entry at the Arizona home of “Today” show host Savannah Guthrie’s mother.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live

item.title: NASA hopes to fix Artemis II moon rocket leak with on-pad repair
item.description: NASA plans to test the planned leak repair with a second dress rehearsal fueling test later this month.
